headerDisplay: homebridge-blinds-wired creates window covering (or blind) accessories in HomeKit, providing control and status functions through the command line scripts.
footerDisplay: For additional help and documentation please see the [developer page](https://github.com/adrianmihai83/homebridge-blinds-wired).

name.title: Blind Name
name.description: Name you want to give this blind accessory in HomeKit. Each blind must have a unique name.

upPin.title: Up Pin
upPin.placeholder: GPIO (BCM numbering) pin used for Up/Open
upPin.description: GPIO (BCM numbering) pin used for Up/Open

downPin.title: Down Pin
downPin.placeholder: GPIO (BCM numbering) pin used for Down/Close
downPin.description: GPIO (BCM numbering) pin used for Down/Close

stopPin.title: Stop Pin
stopPin.placeholder: GPIO (BCM numbering) pin used for Stop
stopPin.description: GPIO (BCM numbering) pin used for Stop - use `99` for Somfy DCT (requieres a pulse on both Up and Down pins for stopping movement). Default: 99.

pulseDuration.title: Pulse duration of changing level changes on GPIO ports (ms)
pulseDuration.description: Pulse duration of changing level changes on GPIO ports (ms). Default: 200.

activeLow.title: Active Low Relay?
activeLow.description: Is the relay controlled by the GPIO pin active on Low or High? Default: true

transitionInterval.title: Transition Duration (seconds)
transitionInterval.description: Duration, in seconds, of an open or close event used to simulate action progress in HomeKit. Default: 10.0.

manufacturer.title: Blind Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer name to assign to this blind.

model.title: Blind Model
model.description: Model name to assign to this blind.

layout.description: Provide the details of your blinds

items.description: These settings are optional and allow you to set additional information about your blinds.
